categories.title: Rent
categories.comment: We rented only for two months this year. Travel rent is in a different category.

categories.title: Mortgage
categories.comment: Still mortgage-free.

categories.title: Utilities
categories.comment: This includes utilities from our property while it was unoccupied.

categories.title: Tax
categories.comment: Residence tax for the previous year.

categories.title: Repairs
categories.comment: I did some minor work before selling our apartment.

categories.title: Groceries
categories.comment: Almost the same level of spending on groceries. Although we din't eat lunches at work anymore.

categories.title: Eating out
categories.comment: This is because we hadn't kitchen for a few months and forced to eat out.

categories.title: Alcohol
categories.comment: Bars, parties, beer at home.

categories.title: Gas
categories.comment: This doesn't include traveling. Only errands around the city.

categories.title: Maintenance
categories.comment: New tires, suspension repairs after traveling around Russia.

categories.title: Car Tax
categories.comment: Tax for the previous year.

categories.title: Insurance
categories.comment: We got insurance with a huge discount due to residence issues.

categories.title: Parking
categories.comment: All parking outside Moscow is almost free.

categories.title: Public transport
categories.comment: No regular commute. Train tickets to visit family.

categories.title: Car rent
categories.comment: We used car-sharing in Sochi and Moscow.

categories.title: Taxi
categories.comment: Huge up here due to wife's pregnancy.

categories.title: Health Insurance
categories.comment: No paid insurance. Only basic from the government.

categories.title: Doctor visits
categories.comment: Pregnancy and minor dental issues.

categories.title: Pharmacy
categories.comment: Almost all of this is pregnancy medicines.

categories.title: Entertainment
categories.comment: Tickets to The Devil Wears Prada. And several SPAs in the mountains.

categories.title: Education
categories.comment: This was the family and construction year. We took zero courses but read several clever books on time management, design, philosophy, and minimalism.

categories.title: Sport
categories.comment: Weights for home training.

categories.title: Hobbies and arts
categories.comment: Nastya's oils for her new perfume hobby.

categories.title: Clothing
categories.comment: This was the year of getting rid of the clothes.

categories.title: Tech & Gadgets
categories.comment: I switched from Pixel 3 to iPhone SE. I had issues with Android. And Pixel was too good to carry around on construction sites :)

categories.title: Home stuff
categories.comment: Stuff for the baby who was born the 20th of December.

categories.title: Work supplies
categories.comment: Some of Nastya's stuff.

categories.title: Household goods
categories.comment: We went zero-waste this year. So we stopped buying plastic-packaged goods (almost). Baking soda and lime acid work like magic.

categories.title: Cell phone
categories.comment: The new cell phone plan is really cheap.

categories.title: Subscriptions
categories.comment: Only the domain name. I have only two devices, so I switched to a free plan on Evernote.

categories.title: Personal
categories.comment: We started to use this category for Leo's diapers, etc.

categories.title: Misc
categories.comment: Some stuff for the baby.

categories.title: Hotels
categories.comment: Our trip to the Sochi mountains for three months.

categories.title: Travel Transportation
categories.comment: Driving to the sea and back.

categories.title: Travel Entertainment
categories.comment: Since it was our first long trip we treated entertainment as regular expenses.

categories.title: Food and other
categories.comment: The same as with entertainment above.

categories.title: Presents
categories.comment: Birthday presents and gratitude for the nurses work in a maternity home.

categories.title: Parties hosting
categories.comment: No parties hosted this year.

categories.title: Charity
categories.comment: To our shame almost nothing here.

categories.title: Taxes and fees
categories.comment: Income taxes.

categories.title: Fines
categories.comment: We left our car in an inappropriate place again. This time in Sochi.

categories.title: Investments
categories.comment: We started earning income from our rental property.

categories.title: Paycheck
categories.comment: Kinda scary at first. But we had cash stashed away.

categories.title: Side hustle
categories.comment: My part-time work covered a major part of our expenses.

categories.title: Interest
categories.comment: More interest from our cash accounts this year.

categories.title: Stuff sales
categories.comment: More income from our minimalistic lifestyle. We sold furniture and stuff from our previous apartment. And all the books. I left only Kindle.

categories.title: Presents
